title: H5P Crossword Puzzle
taskDescription:
An H5P crossword

Find the correct answers to the following H5P related clues to complete the crossword puzzle!

words.clue: Company that provides the H5P core team
Company name that Oliver Tacke uses to brand his H5P development
H5P content type that requires students to write down what they listened to
City where the H5P conference in 2018 took place
Learning management system from Australia that included H5P in its core
"Create, share and ... interactive HTML5 content in your browser"

overallFeedback.feedback: :-( Do you know H5P at all?
Great! You seem to like H5P! Or crosswords ...
